QuestData.Title: Walking the Dog
QuestData.Description: Hmmmphh.... it seems they'll let anyone in these days.$B$BVery well. You doubtlessly became acquainted with Smolderos in the proving grounds.$B$BWell, I've been entrusted with the care of one of his pups. Quite the little terror -- if he grows up to be anything like his father he shall serve our cause well.$B$BCollect meat from the basilisks around the area and feed them to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect and feed 5 pieces of Charred Basilisk Meat to the Spawn of Smolderos.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well... is he fed? I'm not taking him back unless the little monster's not hungry anymore.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. This little pup will grow to be strong and merciless like his father.
